dmca.title: CANNOT VERIFY NOTICE
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. Phillips:

This firm has been retained by Funtasia Too concerning your registration of the above referenced website. Funtasia Too operates a website at www.funtasiatoo.com, as you are well aware. You have substantially copied the logo of Funtasia Too in creating your website therefore infringing on their valid trademark. Further, it appears that the only purpose of your website is not to promote commerce, but to attempt to maliciously harm Funtasia Too. At times, your content on the website has been about alcoholism, about sexual matters,a nd sometimes devoid of content. Nonetheless, by the use of the name Funtasia Too and by the use of a deceptively similar logo, it is aparent that you are attempitn to cause harm to my client.

This is you notice that you have seven days from the date of this letter to cease and desist the operation of the website, www.funtasiatoo.net. All content from the website needs to be disbanded, the use of any logo representing Funtasia Too needs to be deleted, and we demand that you not extend your registration of this website.

If you do not comply with the terms of this letter, a legal action willl be brought against you in the United States Federal Court for malicious actions. My client will seek thier actural dmages, a restratining order, recovery of their attorney fees, and court cost in such actions. To avoid such unnecessary litigation, please comply witht this demand and confrim your compliance to me in writing as sonn as possible.

Sincerly;
David M. Pyke
